overview:
Leslie Bernauer â€“ VP Business Product & Operations, Limos.com

Leslie Bernauer joined Limos.com in May 2010. Most recently, Ms. Bernauer was a Senior Vice President at Lehman Brothers, where she directed a $350M global travel program that included $50M in car services annually. Prior to this, she held similar positions in global travel management at Deutsche Bank / Bankers Trust and Morgan Stanley. Ms. Bernauer started her career with American Express after attending Kean University.
